mapper.select: SELECT b.id,b.name,b.linkUrl,b.path,b.priority,b.description,b.icon,b.parentMenuId FROM (SELECT e.* FROM t_role r,(SELECT t.id,t.username,ur.`role_id` FROM t_user t INNER JOIN t_user_role ur ON t.id=ur.user_id AND username= #{username} ) e WHERE r.id = e.role_id) a, (SELECT * FROM t_role_menu rm,t_menu m WHERE rm.menu_id = m.`id`) b WHERE a.role_id=b.role_id
SELECT * FROM t_menu m,(SELECT priority,parentMenuId FROM t_menu WHERE parentMenuId IS NULL) p WHERE p.priority=m.parentMenuId AND m.`priority`=#{priority}
